title: Claude can now search the web
summary: Anthropic's Claude AI chatbot now has web search capabilities, allowing it to access and process real-time information for more accurate and up-to-date responses.  This feature provides direct citations for easy fact-checking and delivers information in a conversational format.  Web search enhances Claude's existing knowledge base, enabling it to answer questions based on current data.  The article highlights several use cases, including sales teams leveraging market trends, financial analysts accessing current market data, researchers improving grant proposals and literature reviews, and shoppers comparing products.  Currently, web search is available as a feature preview for paid Claude users in the United States, with support for free plan users and other countries coming soon.  Users can activate this feature in their profile settings and begin conversations with Claude 3.7 Sonnet to utilize the web search functionality.
chinese_title: Claude现在可以搜索网页了。
chinese_summary: Anthropic 的 Claude AI 聊天机器人现在具备了网络搜索功能，可以访问和处理实时信息，从而提供更准确、更及时的回复。此功能提供直接引用，便于事实核查，并以对话的形式传递信息。网络搜索增强了 Claude 现有的知识库，使其能够根据当前数据回答问题。文章重点介绍了几个用例，包括销售团队利用市场趋势、金融分析师访问当前市场数据、研究人员改进拨款提案和文献综述，以及购物者比较产品。目前，网络搜索功能作为一项预览功能提供给美国的付费 Claude 用户，对免费计划用户和其他国家/地区的支持即将推出。用户可以在个人资料设置中激活此功能，并开始与 Claude 3.7 Sonnet 对话以使用网络搜索功能。

title: Calibre 8.0 Release
summary:
Calibre 8.0 brings significant improvements, notably enhanced Kobo support with native KEPUB editing and automatic EPUB to KEPUB conversion.  It also introduces "Connect to Folder" functionality, beneficial for Chromebooks.  Other enhancements include improved Table of Contents editing, macOS icon updates, and author search link suppression. Bug fixes address tabbing issues, catalog generation with templates, author renaming, full-text search within archives, viewer TOC tracking, metadata recognition, and various other regressions.

Several incremental updates leading up to 8.0 (7.26 - 7.18) introduced features like custom column web search links, custom icons for Tag browser items, KFX import, and series name transformation rules. Bug fixes resolved metadata editing problems, conversion issues, Nook Glowlight 4 compatibility on Windows, and Kobo driver regressions. A new PDF input engine with automatic header/footer detection was introduced in 7.20, along with a neural network-based text-to-speech engine (Piper) in 7.18 for more realistic read aloud voices.  Performance improvements include faster opening of large EPUB files in 7.19.  Each release also features improved and new news sources.

title: Next generation LEDs are cheap and sustainable
summary: Linköping University researchers have found that next-generation LEDs using perovskite materials offer a cheaper, more sustainable alternative to traditional LEDs.  While perovskite LEDs boast vibrant colors and ease of manufacturing, their commercial viability hinges on more than just technical performance.  A life cycle assessment revealed the importance of considering the entire product lifespan, from raw material production to disposal.  Specifically, researchers highlighted the environmental impact of gold production used in current LEDs, suggesting copper, aluminum, or nickel as sustainable replacements.  While concerns exist regarding the toxicity of lead within perovskites, its impact is less significant than other materials.  The study emphasizes the need for a broader research perspective, considering cost and environmental impact alongside performance.  Perovskite LED longevity remains a key challenge, with current lifespans significantly shorter than traditional LEDs.  However, rapid advancements in perovskite technology suggest a promising future for this sustainable lighting solution.  Funding for the research came from various sources, including the Marianne and Marcus Wallenberg Foundation and the Swedish Research Council.
chinese_title: 新一代LED灯既便宜又环保。
chinese_summary: 林雪平大学的研究人员发现，使用钙钛矿材料的下一代LED灯为传统LED灯提供了一种更便宜、更可持续的替代方案。虽然钙钛矿LED灯拥有鲜艳的色彩和易于制造的优势，但其商业可行性不仅仅取决于技术性能。一项生命周期评估显示，考虑整个产品生命周期，从原材料生产到最终处置，至关重要。具体来说，研究人员强调了当前LED灯中使用的黄金生产对环境的影响，并建议使用铜、铝或镍作为可持续的替代品。尽管人们对钙钛矿中铅的毒性存在担忧，但其影响小于其他材料。该研究强调需要更广泛的研究视角，在考虑性能的同时，还要考虑成本和环境影响。钙钛矿LED灯的寿命仍然是一个关键挑战，目前的寿命明显短于传统LED灯。然而，钙钛矿技术的快速发展表明，这种可持续照明解决方案拥有光明的前景。该研究的资金来自多个来源，包括玛丽安和马库斯·沃伦伯格基金会以及瑞典研究委员会。

title: ACARS Drama
summary:
这篇文章介绍了 ACARS Drama，一个社交媒体机器人项目，它收集并分享来自飞机的 ACARS 和 VDLM2 数据传输中的有趣信息。作者解释了 ACARS 和 VDLM2 是分别用于飞机与地面之间数据通信的旧式和新型协议，并简述了如何使用廉价的 SDR 设备和开源软件接收和解码这些信号。

由于每小时会接收到大约 2000 条信息，其中大部分是例行数据，该机器人使用关键词过滤机制，只分享包含人工输入的“自由文本”内容的信息，例如飞行员或机组人员在飞行管理计算机 (FMC) 上键入的内容。这些信息通常涉及登机口确认、飞机故障报告（例如厕所或咖啡机故障），偶尔也会出现醉酒乘客或机上打架等事件。

作者鼓励读者通过提供他们接收到的 ACARS 和 VDLM2 数据来为 ACARS Drama 项目做出贡献，并提供了简单的设置指南和数据提交的端口地址。项目的目的是捕捉飞行中的“drama”，展现飞行员的个性，并提供对航空旅行的幕后一瞥。

title: China is developing some startling new kit in its quest to reclaim Taiwan
summary: This Economist article reports on China's development of new amphibious assault barges designed for a potential invasion of Taiwan. These vessels, being built in Guangzhou, feature retractable legs for stability in shallow water and a 100-meter extendable bridge, allowing them to connect and form large causeways for rapid deployment of troops and equipment onto beaches. The article highlights concerns that these barges represent a significant advancement in China's amphibious capabilities, potentially enabling a faster and more efficient landing on Taiwan's shores than previously possible.  This development is viewed within the context of China's ongoing efforts to assert its claim over Taiwan.
chinese_title: 中国正在研发一些令人震惊的新装备，以实现其收复台湾的目标。
chinese_summary: 这篇《经济学人》的文章报道了中国正在研发新型两栖攻击驳船，旨在为潜在的攻台行动做准备。这些正在广州建造的船只配备了可伸缩的支腿，以增强在浅水区的稳定性，并配备了100米长的可延伸桥梁，使其能够相互连接，形成大型堤道，以便快速将部队和装备部署到海滩上。文章强调了人们的担忧，即这些驳船代表着中国两栖作战能力的重大进步，可能使其能够比以往更快、更高效地在台湾海岸登陆。这一进展被放在中国不断强调其对台湾主张的背景下解读。

title: Particle Based Physics Engine in Golang
summary:
This article introduces Physix-go, a simple and fast 2D physics engine written in GoLang.  It's designed for easy integration with the Ebiten game library and offers features like vector calculations, physics simulations (including rigid body and particle systems), spring dynamics, and collision detection.  

Physix-go provides data structures and functions for creating and manipulating vectors, rigid bodies, and springs.  Users define rigid bodies with properties like position, velocity, mass, and shape (circle or rectangle).  The engine handles updating object positions based on applied forces and simulating collisions with bounce effects based on the coefficient of restitution.  Spring forces are calculated using Hooke's Law and damping.

The article includes code examples demonstrating basic usage, such as creating vectors, applying forces to rigid bodies, and detecting collisions between rectangles and circles.  It also mentions the `ApplyForce` and `ApplyForcePolygon` functions for updating object positions, and the importance of defining a `dt` (delta time) variable for consistent simulations.  The project is open-source and encourages contributions.  It's inspired by Coding Train's Daniel Shiffman's work.
chinese_title: 基于粒子的物理引擎（Go语言实现）
chinese_summary:
本文介绍 Physix-go，一个用 Go 语言编写的简单快速的 2D 物理引擎。它旨在轻松集成到 Ebiten 游戏库，并提供向量计算、物理模拟（包括刚体和粒子系统）、弹簧动力学和碰撞检测等功能。

Physix-go 提供了用于创建和操作向量、刚体和弹簧的数据结构和函数。用户可以通过位置、速度、质量和形状（圆形或矩形）等属性定义刚体。引擎根据施加的力更新对象位置，并根据恢复系数模拟碰撞反弹效果。弹簧力则使用胡克定律和阻尼计算。

本文包含演示基本用法的代码示例，例如创建向量、向刚体施加力以及检测矩形和圆形之间的碰撞。它还提到了 `ApplyForce` 和 `ApplyForcePolygon` 函数用于更新对象位置，以及定义 `dt`（delta 时间）变量对于保持模拟一致性的重要性。该项目是开源的，并鼓励贡献。其灵感来自 Coding Train 的 Daniel Shiffman 的作品。

title: DESI Opens Access to the Largest 3D Map of the Universe Yet
summary:
The Dark Energy Spectroscopic Instrument (DESI) collaboration has publicly released its first major dataset (DR1), offering the largest 3D map of the universe yet. This 270-terabyte dataset includes information on 18.7 million celestial objects – stars, galaxies, and quasars – collected over 13 months.  While DESI's primary goal is to study dark energy, DR1 offers valuable insights into other astrophysical areas, including galaxy evolution, black holes, dark matter, and the Milky Way's structure.

This data release significantly surpasses previous surveys, containing more than twice the extragalactic objects of all prior 3D surveys combined.  Processed at Berkeley Lab's NERSC supercomputer, the data provides precise distances to millions of galaxies, allowing scientists to look back in time up to 11 billion years.  DESI uses 5,000 fiber-optic "eyes" to collect light spectra from distant galaxies, determining their redshift and thus their distance.  This information enables the creation of 3D cosmic maps and reconstructs the history of cosmic growth.

DR1 is just the beginning, representing a fraction of the data DESI will ultimately collect.  The project aims to map over 50 million galaxies and quasars, furthering our understanding of dark energy and other cosmic mysteries. The data is publicly available, empowering researchers worldwide to explore and contribute to scientific discovery.
chinese_title: DESI Opens Access to the Largest 3D Map of the Universe Yet
chinese_summary:

While DESI's primary goal is to study dark energy, DR1 offers valuable insights into other astrophysical areas, including galaxy evolution, black holes, dark matter, and the Milky Way's structure.

title: EVs are starving states of tax money to fix potholes and build roads
summary: Electric vehicles (EVs) present a growing challenge to state transportation funding. While beneficial for the environment, their increasing popularity deprives states of crucial gas tax revenue traditionally used for road maintenance and construction.  This is because EV owners don't purchase gasoline, thus avoiding the tax levied on it.  The article highlights this emerging funding gap, suggesting that states will need to find alternative revenue streams to address the deteriorating road infrastructure as EV adoption continues to rise.  The article uses the ongoing construction of the Stark Street Bridge in Oregon as a visual example of the kind of infrastructure projects funded by gas taxes, and now facing a potential funding shortfall.
chinese_title: 电动汽车正在蚕食各州用于修补道路和建设公路的税收。
chinese_summary: 电动汽车（EV）给各州的交通运输资金带来了日益严峻的挑战。尽管电动汽车对环境有益，但其日益普及使得各州失去了至关重要的燃油税收入，而这些收入传统上用于道路维护和建设。这是因为电动汽车车主不购买汽油，从而避免了对其征收的税费。本文重点介绍了这一新出现的资金缺口，指出随着电动汽车普及率的持续上升，各州将需要寻找替代收入来源，以应对日益恶化的道路基础设施。文章以俄勒冈州斯塔克街大桥正在进行的建设为例，直观地展示了由燃油税资助、现在面临潜在资金短缺的基建项目类型。

title: GPascal – A Blast from the Past (2011)
summary:
本文讨论了 GPascal，一个 Nick Gammon 在 1978 年开发的 Pascal 编译器。最初为 Motorola 6800 评估板设计，后来移植到 Apple II 和 Commodore 64 上。文章链接到一篇博客文章，详细介绍了 GPascal 的历史，并包含图片、PDF 文件、旧广告、"GPascal News" 的期刊以及杂志评论。

Gammon 还分享了 Commodore 64 版本编译器的汇编源码，并解释了源码中使用的令牌化技术，包括消息令牌、源令牌和 P-代码（伪机器代码）。  由于内存限制，错误消息和关键字被令牌化以节省空间。 他详细解释了编译器如何处理源代码以及 P-代码的含义。

文章提供了 GPascal 在 VICE 模拟器上运行的演示视频链接、磁盘镜像下载链接以及语法图表。  此外，还有一位名为 Cjb 的用户使用现代汇编器 cc65 重新构建了 GPascal，并生成了与原始版本字节一致的副本，他还计划将 GPascal 移植到其他 6502 系统。
chinese_title: GPascal – 昔日重现 (2011)
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了 GPascal，这是一款由 Nick Gammon 于 1978 年开发的 Pascal 编译器。最初为 Motorola 6800 评估板而设计，它后来被移植到 Apple II 和 Commodore 64 上。文章链接到一篇博客文章，其中详细介绍了 GPascal 的历史，并包含图片、PDF 文件、旧广告、“GPascal News”期刊以及杂志评论。

Gammon 还分享了 Commodore 64 版本编译器的汇编源码，并解释了源码中使用的令牌化技术，包括消息令牌、源令牌和 P-代码（伪机器代码）。由于内存限制，错误消息和关键字被令牌化以节省空间。他详细解释了编译器如何处理源代码以及 P-代码的含义。

文章提供了 GPascal 在 VICE 模拟器上运行的演示视频链接、磁盘镜像下载链接以及语法图表。此外，一位名叫 Cjb 的用户使用现代汇编器 cc65 重新构建了 GPascal，并生成了与原始版本字节一致的副本，他还计划将 GPascal 移植到其他 6502 系统。
